      • setPID

        public void setPID​(double Kp,
                   double Ki,
                   double Kd)
        set three pid term in order to calculate
        Parameters:
        Kp - Proportional term for the PID controller
        Ki - Integral term for the PID controller
        Kd - derivative term for the PID controller

      • translateAngle

        public static double translateAngle​(double sourceAngle)
        Convert the angle that will continue from 360 to 361 degrees to the range of -180~180 degrees.
        Parameters:
        sourceAngle - the angle that get from the gyro output
        Returns:
        translated angle, from -180~180 degrees
